rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception Area
rooms.description: A grand foyer with Art Deco elements including geometric patterns and metallic accents. This area serves as a welcoming space for the joint family.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: Combines living, dining, and kitchen spaces in an open layout. Features Art Deco design with streamlined furniture and decorative motifs.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan integrated kitchen with modern appliances and decor reflecting the Art Deco era. Equipped for a joint family's needs, offering ample storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A dedicated guest room on the ground floor featuring an attached balcony with Art Deco detailing for privacy and relaxation. Suitable for occasional visitors.

rooms.name: Utility & Service Area
rooms.description: Includes laundry, storage, and service space designed to meet the needs of a joint family. Maintains Art Deco decorative accents.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance door with Art Deco styling, featuring decorative glass and metalwork. Positioned in the north-east to ensure positive energy flow.

openings.name: Living Area Window
openings.description: Large windows with geometric patterns that allow ample natural light, enhancing the open-plan design.

openings.name: Balcony Access Door
openings.description: Separate access door for balconies of bedrooms and guest room, ensuring privacy and ease of movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony with Art Deco detailing, luxurious finishes, and ample storage. Vastu-aligned for good energy.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed bedroom with a balcony designed to offer personal space and privacy. Decorated with Art Deco elements such as geometric trim.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Multi-functional room serving as a private space for the joint family, equipped with comfortable seating and decorative accents from the Art Deco era.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A full ensuite bathroom adjacent to master bedroom, featuring modern fixtures with retro touches. Designed for optimal space usage and privacy.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: Access point to the rooftop terrace, designed with a seamless transition from indoor spaces. Features Art Deco style balustrades and lighting.

openings.name: Bedroom Windows
openings.description: Large windows in bedrooms ensuring adequate natural light, contributing to both aesthetic appeal and Vastu harmony.
